name: estimateCost
description: Estimate monthly cost for the SA Pro tutor serverless pattern (API Gateway + Lambda) based on simple usage assumptions.

dailyRequests.description: Average number of requests per day hitting the SA Pro tutor endpoint.

region.description: AWS Region for the workload, e.g., us-east-1.

lambdaMemoryMb.description: Configured memory size for the Lambda function in MB.

lambdaDurationMs.description: Average Lambda invocation duration in milliseconds.

monthlyCostEstimateUSD.description: Approximate total monthly cost in USD for the serverless pattern.

lambdaRequests.description: Approximate monthly cost for Lambda requests (USD).

lambdaDuration.description: Approximate monthly cost for Lambda GB-seconds (USD).

apiGateway.description: Approximate monthly cost for API Gateway requests (USD).

assumptions.description: Assumptions and derived values used in the estimate.

notes.description: Human-readable notes and guidance about the estimate.
